record.screen: {["rca.view", "ENG", $L.title, $L.format, $L.can.update, , {[{$L.void=fduplicate($filep, $L.filed), $L.update.condition=evaluate(nullsub(parse(strrep(str(update.cond in $L.phase), "$L.file", "$L.filed"), 4), true)), $L.close.condition=evaluate(nullsub(parse(strrep(str(close.cond in $L.phase), "$L.file", "$L.filed"), 4), true)), $L.reopen.condition=evaluate(nullsub(parse(strrep(str(reopen.cond in $L.phase), "$L.file", "$L.filed"), 4), true)), $L.task.opn.condition=evaluate(nullsub(parse(strrep(str(task.opn.cond in $L.phase), "$L.file", "$L.filed"), 4), true)), $L.ke.opn.condition=evaluate(nullsub(parse(strrep(str(ke.opn.cond in $L.phase), "$L.file", "$L.filed"), 4), true)), $L.journal.pm=journal.pm in $G.rc.global.environment, if (not (null(activitylog.file.name in $L.object))) then ($L.use.activity=true) else ($L.use.activity=false), $L.sla.enabled=enable in $G.sla.environment, $L.can.update=evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and evaluate(update.cond in $L.phase) and open in $L.file=true or open in $L.file=false and closed.update in $G.rc.environment=true, if $L.mode#"add" then ($L.can.update=evaluate($L.tableAccess.new)), $L.can.open.task=jscall("tableAccess.getNewAccess", tableAccessTask in $G.rc.environment, folder in $L.file), $ucmdbbrowser.history.url=jscall("uCMDBBrowserUrl.getBrowserHistoryUrl", $L.file), $L.void=jscall("nativeCalendar.getCalendar", $L.file)}, , ]}, "redraw", {[, , , "left", , ]}, "rca.view", , , 31, "yuli", '10/26/14 21:24:27', , , ]}

ds.desc.ds.desc: Search Knowledge;Search the KnowledgeBase for solutions
Search Knowledge;Search the KnowledgeBase for solutions
Create Knowledge;Use this Problem to create a knowledge article.

ds.cond.ds.cond: evaluate(reopen in $G.rc.environment) and open in $L.filed=false and $L.reopen.condition
evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and $L.update.condition and open in $L.file=true and $L.mode~#"add"
evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and ($L.mode="browse" and not (gui()) and not ($L.locked))
evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and $L.update.condition and open in $L.file=true and $L.mode~#"add"

current.phase in $L.filed~=jscall("problemManagement.getLastPhase", category in $L.filed, category.file.name in $L.object) and $L.mode~#"add" and status in $L.filed~="Closed" and evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and $L.update.condition

current.phase in $L.filed~=jscall("problemManagement.getFirstPhase", category in $L.filed, category.file.name in $L.object) and $L.mode~#"add" and open in $L.filed=true and evaluate($L.tableAccess.update) and $L.update.condition
evaluate($L.tableAccess.close) and (open in $L.filed=true and $L.mode~="close" and $L.mode~#"add") and $L.close.condition
nullsub($G.ess, false)=false and nullsub(lioption("Knowledge Management"), false)
change.category in $G.rc.environment and $L.update.condition and $L.mode~#"add" and false
change.phase in $G.rc.environment and $L.update.condition and $L.mode~#"add" and false
$L.update.condition and $L.task.opn.condition and create.task in $G.rc.environment and $L.can.open.task and $L.mode~#"add" and open in $L.filed=true
$L.update.condition and post.to.knowledge in $G.rc.environment and $L.mode~#"add" and not (nullsub($lo.idol.enabled, false))
nullsub($G.ess, false)=false and not (nullsub(kpf.id in $L.filed, false)=false)
gui() and type($L.dd.qbe.format)~=2 and $L.dd.reclist~=0 and nullsub($L.mod.columns, true)
